pub fn hex_to_base64(h: &str) -> String {
    // Decode hex string to bytes
    let bytes = hex::decode(h).expect("Invalid hex string");
    // Encode bytes to base64
    STANDARD.encode(bytes)
}

```rust
pub fn gibberish_score(text: &[u8]) -> f32 {
    text.iter()
        .filter(|&&byte| !byte.is_ascii_alphabetic() && byte != b' ')
        .count() as f32 / (text.len().max(1) as f32)
}
```
</div>

<div class="code-test">
```rust
fn test_gibberish_score() {
    assert_eq!(gibberish_score(b""), 0.0);
    assert_eq!(gibberish_score(b"Hello World"), 0.0);
    
    // 4 non-readable out of 10 chars
    assert_eq!(gibberish_score(b"Helloo123!"), 0.4); 
    assert_eq!(gibberish_score(b"123!@#"), 1.0);
}
```
